00036 class INodeVisitor {
00037 public:
00038 
00039         enum TraverseDirection {
00040                 downwards,
00041                 upwards
00042         };
00043 
00044         INodeVisitor(TraverseDirection direction = downwards){this->direction = direction;};
00045         virtual ~INodeVisitor(){};
00046 
00047         virtual void visit(Node* node){};
00048         virtual void visit(Group* node){};
00049         virtual void visit(Transform* node){};
00050         virtual void visit(GeometricNode* node){};
00051 
00052     TraverseDirection getDirection() const
00053     {
00054         return direction;
00055     }
00056 
00057     void setDirection(TraverseDirection direction)
00058     {
00059         this->direction = direction;
00060     }
00061 
00062 protected:
00063         TraverseDirection direction;
00064 
00065 };
00066 
00067 }
